name: Cuddeback Image Thumbnail
summary: Learn about .JPG.THB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Hunters and wildlife photographers who use Cuddeback trail cameras to monitor activity in outdoor areas are most likely to encounter JPG.THB files. They likely will find them when transferring images from the camera's SD card. JPG.THB files contain compressed image data similar to a standard JPEG image, but they are formatted for internal use by the camera.

instructions: JPG.THB files are not meant to be opened. Instead, Cuddeback cameras reference the files for quick previews that improve browsing speed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
